channel.title: Darn Strawberry...
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Darn Strawberry..."

item.title: Re: Darn Strawberry...
item.content:encoded: Of course, a half-dozen missions after posting this, he finally shows up. I suppose it figures…

item.title: Darn Strawberry...
item.content:encoded:
I've been running missions for a week trying to get Strawberry, and nothing! I'm really getting annoyed by this … I'd let it wait for A-rank and the specific mission if not for the need to get Tats.

For that matter, I haven't seen the +500 ryo or +1500 XP from other missions, either…
